extendedInfo.description: TextNow gives you your very own dedicated phone number with which you can text and call for free.Highlights:- Your own dedicated phone number- Send & receive unlimited texts, for free!- Make and receive voice calls- Earn credits towards calling by completing partnered offers or purchase minute packs!- Free & unlimited voice calls with other TextNow users as well as for incoming calls!- Full picture messaging: send, receive and save pictures!- Voicemail and Call Forwarding- Emoticons :-)- Signatures: append your own signature to each text- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration- Customizable backgrounds- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background- Quick Reply to quickly and easily respond to friends- Home screen widget to quickly launch TextNow, compose a new message or make a call- Unified inbox: send and receive your native texts directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop texting app!- Real texting and calling: text and call ANY regular phone number- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.

reviews.title: great app!
reviews.comment: been using this app for a while, but almost everytime I open it now, it force closes! please fix! also I love the wallpapers for message backgrounds, but it\'d be cool to make it fully customizable!
reviews.author: Corey Poole

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Nice never had any problems, been using for about a mth now. One thing I would love to have, call & text blocking. Some Ppl really needs to be blocked in life. Why does this app log us out sometimes.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix this!
reviews.comment: I use this app a lot but after the last update it glitches up and freezes all the time please fix this crap. I have a samsung galaxy player 3.6 inch screen gingerbread os
reviews.author: Caleb Colosky

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: I want to know why every freaking morning I wake up textnow sits there and force closes all the time when I try to text or wont send texts fix and I might give 5 stars back DROID X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Def. 5 stars!!! It\'s better than any text/call app on the market!!! :) Super happy that it\'s free too! <3
reviews.author: Karen Romig

reviews.title: App stopped working
reviews.comment: I have not been able to use this app for 2 days now....at first I thought it was my internet connection but everything else works on my phone so that\'s not it
reviews.author: Lemarc Humphrey

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: I can\'t get or send pictures.... PLEASE FIX!! then it\'d be worth five stars! For all: BEST TEXTING APP OF ALL TIME!!! HTC EVO 4g

reviews.title: Best free texting app \360\237\230\230\342\230\272\360\237\222\227
reviews.comment: Its  the best app out here , free texting , you get  a number for yourself , and free calling also , you just need to earn minutes by watching two minutes video\'s , just download this app :)

reviews.comment: It works fine I prefer to use the default text app on my phone but some of my friends can only talk on this so I got it and the screen always flashes on and off but it works

reviews.title: Great app for wind mobile users
reviews.comment: Use it solely for voice mail.  I have unlimited call forwarding and unlimited data but 10 bucks for voice mail?  Now I got it for free.

reviews.comment: Every time I make a call 20 seconds in it\'ll disconnected from the call but also take my credits away please fix

reviews.title: Used to be great

reviews.title: Fix Please!
reviews.comment: Iv been using textnow for a while its amazing! I love it, but just recently its not allowing me to send any messages even though I have connection? Please Fix it Soon! <3

reviews.title: Y u no fix?!
reviews.comment: It\'s been crashing and closing unexpectedly for the past 2 weeks. Please fix it.
reviews.author: Cynthia Beltran

reviews.title: Fix this
reviews.comment: Every time I open your app or get a text an ad pops up and then takes me to the Google play store Candy Crush app. If thus isn\'t fixed soon I\'m changing apps. I can deal with ads but this is ridiculous.
reviews.author: Brett Heller

reviews.title: TextNow
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app, especially when I lose service and there\'s Wifi around. It\'s very useful. EXCEPT, the fact that there\'s a number(texting) AND there\'s an email(for sending/receiving pictures). I think it should just be the number for it all. Overall, great app :).
reviews.author: Austin James

reviews.title: Loyal user.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a loyal text now user for close to a year, i\'ve actually stopped using Verizon/AT&T/Sprint and only use text now. Since todays update it keeps crashing, hopefully it gets resolved fast cause I know i\'m not the only one. Till then sorry you only get 4 stars. :(
